alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 4:11PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST this evening to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous travel conditions are expected along area highways, including Interstate 40 east of Highway 93, where accumulations of up to 4 inches are possible. Strong winds combined with snowfall may lead to blowing snow and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
